allow:
Bash(gh pr create --base master --head tail --title "Add range calculator with mission profile analysis" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Add interactive Range tab to HTML viewer with Breguet range equation for propeller aircraft
- Implement mission segment fuel fraction analysis using Raymer method
- Create wide mission profile chart (1400px) showing all flight phases with 1000nm cruise + 12hr loiter
- Add fuel_mass field to MassProperties for range calculations
- Include AVL and XFOIL executables in dependencies folder

## Features
- **Range Calculator**: Breguet equation with configurable SFC, propeller efficiency, and L/D
- **Mission Profile Chart**: Visual representation of warmup, takeoff, climb, cruise, loiter, descent, landing
- **Fuel Fraction Analysis**: Detailed table showing weight at each mission segment
- **Endurance Summary**: Total mission time calculation

## Test plan
- [ ] Verify HTML viewer loads with Range tab
- [ ] Check mission profile chart displays correctly at full width
- [ ] Validate fuel fraction calculations match expected Raymer values
- [ ] Confirm range displayed in nautical miles

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)")
